welcome_2: Here you’ll have access to all your inspiration from your favorite people and brands . I will talk to you when there is something new interesting about the ones you pick.
welcome_3: First, you have to add them! Choose your favourite Youtubers 🎥, Twitters 🐦, Podcasts 🎙️ or Blogs 📰. Or search for them directly.
welcome_back_1: Happy to see you $1, I was missing you! 🙃
twitter_subtitle: The world-famous blue bird chanting for you
podcast_subtitle: Get notified on your favourite audio series
subscribed: You are now subscribed to $1 and will start receiving everything published in real-time 🙌🏻
preview: You can also see what has been published before. Do you want to see it now? 🔦
